flawed_nl_solution:
Malcolm has 240 followers + 500 followers = <<240+500=740>>740 followers on Instagram and Facebook.
He has 740 followers / 2 = <<740/2=307>>307 followers on Twitter.
He has 307 followers x 3 = <<307*3=921>>921 followers on Tiktok.
He has 921 followers + 510 followers = <<921+510=1431>>1431 followers on Youtube.
Altogether, Malcolm has 740 followers + 307 followers + 921 followers + 1431 followers = <<740+307+921+1431=3399>>3399 followers on social media.
#### 3399

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 370, not 307. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
